title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. It is observed that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row should be deleted. However, the second row should remain intact. The Launch item should stay on the second row, and its position should not change when the delete occurs.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Press the Delete button
2. Observe the first item on the second row being deleted and the position of the Launch item on the second row
